body:
BUILTIN entrypoints and Torque/CSA spots for case conversion:
- builtins/builtins-string.cc: BUITIN(StringPrototypeToLowerCase) and BUITIN(StringPrototypeToUpperCase) -> call ConvertCase(..., isolate->runtime_state()->to_lower_mapping()/to_upper_mapping()).
- builtins/builtins-intl-gen.cc: TF_BUILTIN(StringToLowerCaseIntl, IntlBuiltinsAssembler) and TF_BUILTIN(StringPrototypeToLowerCaseIntl, IntlBuiltinsAssembler) -> CallBuiltin(Builtin::kStringToLowerCaseIntl, ...)
- builtins/builtins-intl.cc: BUITIN(StringPrototypeToUpperCaseIntl)
- init/bootstrapper.cc: registers Builtin::kStringPrototypeToLowerCase and Intl variants in bootstrapping.
Purpose: anchors for the JS-level builtins and CSA/Torque-generated entry points for non-Intl and Intl variants.
explanation: Provides exact builtin names and the primary C++ functions that implement String.prototype.toLowerCase/UpperCase and their Intl variants. These are the entry points used by higher-tier compilers (Maglev/TurboFan) and runtimes.
